hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks on the chart to help us solve.

The first set of blocks has $\purpleD6$ hundreds, $\purpleD2$ tens, and $\purpleD5$ ones.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5041714e93b50d32639daa01d6dbc7ff47c51503)

So our first number is $\purpleD{625}$.

The second set of blocks has $\maroonD2$ hundreds, $\maroonD1$ ten, and $\maroonD4$ ones.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/695db2c8c5a6d3a5369821c13d8660f769f5772d)

So the second number is $\maroonD{214}$.

This expression represents the place value blocks:

$625 - 214$

question.content:
**Which expression can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/43ae6c6836754e0a3addb360f5e72efce60f7c8c)

[[☃ radio 1]]
